Detailed Description

Abstract interface for to configure the Nearest Neighbor search algorithm.

Member Function Documentation

int brics_3d::INearestNeighborSetup::getDimension ( ) const [inline]

Get the current dimension of the data set.

Size of the dimension is automatically determined by setData() or is -1 if no data is present.

Returns:
Returns the dimension

void brics_3d::INearestNeighborSetup::setMaxDistance ( double  maxDistance) [inline]

Set the maximum allowed distance to a neighbor.

If this value is is set below 0.0 than it is neglected in the search queries.

Parameters:
maxDistanceSet the maximum distance

double brics_3d::INearestNeighborSetup::maxDistance [protected]

Maximal allowed distance to a neighbor.

Sometimes also referred as "radius".

If this value is below 0.0 than it is neglected in the search queries.
